ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wake Up Call
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My complaint is that the boring span is longer than any other caster at that level range. Intcasters get three sets of useful spells during that boring
ygData.messageBody:
--- Henrik Holm <HEH@...> wrote:
> Heh,
> Identify has its uses actually. With it you can identify for instance the
> Ancient coins used in the nostrolo tamborine quest.
> Agreed there are periods of a bards life that are a bit boring, but I think
> that goes for every char.. Bards have a great advantage at the higher
> levels
> in terms of their ability to solo and fill many roles in a group.

My complaint is that the boring span is longer than any other caster at that
level range. Intcasters get three sets of useful spells during that boring
span, wiscasters two, and even with hybrids they get spells at nine, then
fifteen, then twenty two, never having to go eight levels without anything useful.

=====
There are things in the Constitution that have been overtaken by events, by time...Inappropriate, anachronistic, it isn't done anymore...
-- Chairman Henry Hyde, who doesn't believe the Constitution needs to be followed or legally changed, just ignored.
